required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pattern of Statins Use in Catalonia
clinical_study.official_title: Pattern of Statins Use in Catalonia

brief_summary.textblock: To describe the new statins prescription pattern in Catalonia (getting their first prescription for any statin, or receiving a change in their statin treatment including switching, changing in doses or adding ezetimibe/fibrates) since September 2009.

detailed_description.textblock: Pattern of statins use in Catalonia.

primary_outcome.measure: Description of detailed clinical treatment in terms of duration of treatment, doses, drug switches and add-on therapy, in patients with hypercholesterolemia and on treatment with statins from the index date.

primary_outcome.description: Number of patient, whom the drug was prescribed by the specified type of prescriber (specialist, general practitioner, etc.)

primary_outcome.measure: Date of change from previous statin to new.

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of demographic data including: Sex, Age, Height (cm), Weight (kg), Smoking habits (packs-years), Alcohol consume habits (units/week), active worker or retired, Pregnancy.

secondary_outcome.description: Total Cholesterol data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin. That values will be collected for all the patients fulfilling criteria.
LDL cholesterol data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin.
HDL data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin.
TG data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin.
ASAT data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin.
Serum Glucose data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin.
CK data was collected till the last laboratory values before the date of change from previous statin to new statin.

study_pop.textblock: Hypercolesterolemic patients in treatment with statins.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria
- Patient with a new prescription of statin Patients receiving one or more changes of the statins treatment
Exclusion Criteria
- Patient with not full information
